title: Namespace Plugin Declaration
description: Declares a plugin registered under a namespace.

id.description: The DID of the namespace plugin.

namespace.description: The DID of the namespace that owns this plugin.

author.description: DID of the entity or user who created the plugin.

compatibleNodes.description: The node types this plugin is designed to run on.

id.description: The id of the linked resource.

name.description: The name of the linked resource.

description.description: The description of the linked resource.

uri.description: The uri of the linked resource.

type.description: The type of resource (e.g., governance, metadata, event log).

linkedResources.description: References to plugin documentation, code, or policies.

approvedBy.description: List of governance bodies or validators that approved the plugin.

complianceRules.description: Reference to compliance policies stored in Ceramic.

governance.description: Governance and compliance information for the plugin.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when this plugin declaration was issued.
